TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MailAddressCollection extends System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection`1<class System.Net.Mail.MailAddress>
Public Class MailAddressCollection Inherits Collection(Of MailAddress)

Docs.summary: Store email addresses that are associated with an email message.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage.To%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage.CC%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage.Bcc%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties return instances of this class that are used to hold the respective email addresses.
For details on the mail address formats supported by the <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailAddressCollection> class, see the <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailAddress> class.
## Examples The following example adds an email address to the <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailAddressCollection> that is returned by the <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage.Bcc%2A> property.
[!code-cpp[NclMailSync#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CPP/NclMailSync.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[NclMailSync#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CS/mail.cs#9)]

Docs.param: The email addresses to add to the . Multiple email addresses must be separated with a comma character (",").
Docs.summary: Add a list of email addresses to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If multiple email addresses separated with a semicolon character (";") are passed in the `addresses` parameter. a <xref:System.FormatException> exception is raised.

Docs.exception: The parameter is an empty string.
The parameter contains an email address that is invalid or not supported.

Docs.summary: Returns a string representation of the email addresses in this object.
Docs.returns: A containing the email addresses in this collection.

remarks.format:
## Remarks When this collection contains multiple addresses, they are separated by a comma character (",").
## Examples The following example displays the email addresses in the <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailAddressCollection> that are returned by the <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage.Bcc%2A> property.
[!code-cpp[NclMailSync#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CPP/NclMailSync.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[NclMailSync#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CS/mail.cs#9)]
